TopicTitle: FanWork Fridays: A Wild Squadcast Appears!

Articles.Content:
<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/301cb0bc17ca76a396dc75e2651dee4d/tumblr_inline_n2gemhmlxO1rr2wit.jpg"/></p>

<p><object data="http://www.twitch.tv/widgets/archive_embed_player.swf" height="378" id="clip_embed_player_flash" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="420"><param name="movie" value="http://www.twitch.tv/widgets/archive_embed_player.swf"><param name="allowScriptAccess" value="always"><param name="allowNetworking" value="all"><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"><param name="flashvars" value="title=KSP-TV%253A%2BSquadcast%252C%2Bhangout%2Bstyle%2521%2BQuestion%2Btime%2Bwith%2Bthe%2Bdevs%2521&channel=ksptv&auto_play=false&start_volume=25&archive_id=511110621"></object></p>

<p>We interrupt your regularly scheduled <strong>FanWork Friday</strong> to bring you the latest episode of <strong>Squadcast</strong>. Consider this episode a “SQ&A.” Maxmaps, Calisker, C7Studios and HarvesteR recap <strong>SXSW</strong>, look ahead to <strong>GDC</strong> and answer your questions about the upcoming <strong>Asteroid Redirect Mission</strong> and <strong>0.24</strong> releases.</p>

<p>You can also click <a href="http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/72561-Squadcast-Q-A-Transcript-request-please!?p=1022483&viewfull=1#post1022483"><strong>HERE</strong></a> for a text recap of the video.</p>

Awwwww yeah.

Can't wait for the Asteroid Redirect Mission.

I'm going to grab an big asteroid then perform an safe powered landing on Eve or Tylo, or better yet, deliver it to an boat on Laythe.

Or, more likely we'll have asteroids fleeing the suddenly lithobraking rockets of Kerbin.
Still sad that no fanwork firdays, but still, SQUADCAST!
